name: #4 Poritz
description:
Brazil has a rich biodiversity. Palmas, state of Tocantins, is a city that might be very hot sometimes, reaching temperatures over 40ºC, but it has a wonderful biome (Cerrado). This art shows some Araras and Cajús, which is part of the Cerrado. The sunflowers are a reference to the Girassóis Square, a famous park of this city.

This art was made for the #oBRjkt2 event.

Protect the Cerrado! Protect the Amazon rainforest! Fora Bolsonaro!
